attributes.action: Cease all House building on flood plains within the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Local planners throughout the UK are building on Flood Plains causing new areas to become flooded, destroying peoples homes. With insurance companies now refusing to insure homes against flooding, and new enviromentel issues, it is the duty of the PM to stop this foolishness.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
